backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, child profiles, alarm events, biometric records, and PIN verification with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs for deployment, branding, and routing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, hook, and page.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining steps to build and publish the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining light and dark themes using OKLCH color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting app metadata and loading the main client script.
frontend/public/404.html: Static 404 page that redirects deep links back to the SPA root with encoded route information.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, SPA deep‑link recovery, theme provider, and user profile setup logic.
frontend/src/components/Alarm/PinAcknowl: Form for entering and verifying the guardian PIN to acknowledge and stop an active alarm.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query‑cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time guardian profile creation, saving the user's name to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/AlarmEv: Displays a scrollable list of alarm/access events, showing child name, timestamp, and acknowledgment status using fetched event and profile data.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Biometr: Manages adding, viewing, and deleting biometric and touch records for a selected child, combining both record types into a unified timeline.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/ChildPr: Handles creating, renaming, archiving, and listing child profiles with dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Guardia: Provides a form to set or update the guardian PIN with basic validation and server-side persistence.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Princip: Allows linking or unlinking Internet Identity principals to child profiles and shows guidance about principal-based authentication.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/TouchCa: Captures raw touch samples during pointer interaction, normalizing coordinates and emitting collected data to a parent component.
Main layout component with header, navigation, alarm redirect logic, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarm.ts: React Query hooks for checking alarm status and triggering or acknowledging alarms.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarmEvent: Fetches alarm event history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBiometricR: Hooks for retrieving, adding, and deleting biometric records tied to a child.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChildProfi: CRUD hooks for child profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller's user profile, role, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useGuardianPi: Mutation hooks for setting and verifying the guardian PIN.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePrincipalL: Hooks for linking and unlinking principals to child profiles and fetching linked data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTouchRecor: Hooks for managing touch records for a child, including add and delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Alarm.tsx: Displays an alarm screen when a child profile triggers access, plays a looping synthesized audio tone, and requires guardian PIN acknowledgement to stop the alarm.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the guardian dashboard with tabs for managing child profiles, records, linked accounts, logs, and PIN settings, restricting access to admin users.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page handling authentication state, promoting app features, and allowing guardians or linked children to trigger or simulate alarms.
frontend/src/pages/LimitationsPrivacy.ts: Shows information about app limitations and privacy practices, including browser constraints and how stored biometric or touch-sensing data is handled.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, animations, plugins, and responsive container settings for the app UI.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, requirements, and architectural notes for a child-access detection app, including constraints around biometrics, data storage, and domain rules. Lists existing features, known issues, and versioning details for planning future development.
